name: general_boot
description: General boot event, reported when the validator is started.

vote_account.description: The base58 encoding of the validator vote public key.

genesis_hash.description: The genesis hash of the cluster that the validator is running on.

commit_hash.description: The commit hash of the validator software that is running.

feature_set.description: The feature set of the validator software that is running.

topology.description: The tile topology of the validator, formatted as JSON.

configuration.description: The full configuration of the validator, formatted as JSON.

osversion.description: A raw dumpout of /proc/version. TODO USE uname(2) ??
